subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The GitHub Annotation Check formats Checkstyle violations as GitHub annotations. This allows the violations to be displayed inline with the diff in GitHub pull requests.

subsection.name: Properties
subsection.p: This check does not require any properties.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: Example of GitHub Annotation output for a line with a violation:
subsection.source: ::error file=MyClass.java,line=10,col=5::'method def' child has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be 4.

subsection.name: Notes
subsection.p: To use this check, include it in your checkstyle configuration file (e.g., checkstyle-checks.xml).
